entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Gillam
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:21 AM CDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -19.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gillam Airport 06:00 AM CDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -19.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -23.0°C
Wind: NE 22 km/h gust 44 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
